Balance
Increases ATK SPD by {Passive_BasePercent.1} on CRIT HIT. Stacks up to {Continuous_MaxStack.2} time(s). Reduces CRIT DMG by {Passive_BasePercent.2}%.
Deals additional damage equal to {Active_ApFactor.1}% of ATK on Basic Attack. Decreases skill damage by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%.
Increases DoT by {Passive_BasePercent.1}% and damage received by {Passive_BasePercent.2}%.
Increases skill damage based on casting time (25% per sec). Increases skill casting time and channeling cycle by {Passive_BasePercent.2}%.
Deals damage equal to {Active_ApFactor.1}% of ATK upon dealing damage {Continuous_MaxStack.2} time(s) to the target. Deals damage equal to {Active_ApFactor.2}% of Max HP to yourself.
Increases HP and ATK of all monsters by {Passive_BasePercent.1}.
Increases applied value from Element matchup by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%.
Increases monster skill damage based on MP cost ({Passive_BasePercent.1}% per MP).
Monsters restore {Active_BaseAmount.1} MP for every {Continuous_MaxStack.2} Basic Attack(s).
Removes {Active_BaseAmount.1} buff(s) from all enemies each time a skill is used, and inflicts up to {Active_ApFactor.2} irremovable DoT effect(s) based on the number of buffs removed.
Generates a Barrier equal to {Passive_BasePercent.1}% of Max HP on yourself every {Continuous_Tick.1} sec. A different effect is triggered when the Barrier is maintained or destroyed.
Deals additional damage equal to {Active_ApFactor.1}% of ATK to enemies except the target on Basic Attack.
CRIT HIT always occurs when attacking enemies with 50% or lower HP.
Generates Ice Armor on a monster every {Continuous_Tick.1} sec.
When your skill is blocked or an action is disabled, strengthens yourself and stuns all enemies for {Continuous_Duration.2} sec.
Increases monster's damage and damage received by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%.
Reduces all Skill Cost by {Active_ApFactor.1}. Increases ATK SPD and Cast Speed by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%.

Acceleration Buff
Increases HP gained from gear by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%. Increases healing by {Passive_BasePercent.2}%. Reduces damage received from the nearest enemy by {Passive_BasePercent.3}%.
Heals the ally with the lowest HP by {Active_ApFactor.1}% of ATK upon Basic Attack. Doubles the healing for every {Continuous_MaxStack.2} Basic Attack(s).

Generates a Barrier equal to 50% of your DEF if the healed target's HP is less than 50%. (Triggered only once every 3 sec) Every {Continuous_MaxStack.1} attack(s), generates a Barrier equal to 50% of your DEF for you and the ally with the lowest HP.
Generates a Barrier equal to {Passive_Barrier_Params_AbsorbFactor.1}% of your HP at the start of battle. (Triggered only once per battle. Lasts for {Continuous_Duration.1} sec)
Reduces damage received by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%.
Increases DEF by {Passive_BasePercent.1}% for {Continuous_Duration.2} sec each time you receive a debuff.
Increases ATK of all allies by {Passive_BasePercent.1}% for {Continuous_Duration.3} sec every {Continuous_MaxStack.2} Basic Attack(s). Stacks up to {Continuous_MaxStack.3} time(s).
Increases your healing done by {Passive_BasePercent.1}%. Additionally increases healing by {Passive_BasePercent.2}% if your HP is less than 50%.
Accumulates life energy based on HP percentage of the healed target. The accumulated life energy is consumed after each Basic Attack and heals the ally with the lowest HP.
